Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students separated by a distance and connected by a string telephone.
The student can illustrate the string telephone as a device that uses sound to communicate between the two students.
The student can show in their drawing that the string is used to send and receive sound waves between the two students.
The student can depict how the students are using the string telephone to solve the problem of communicating over the long distance represented in the drawing.
The student can label or visually convey the concept that the string telephone is an example of using technology to communicate over distances.
